en.name: In the Name of the World
en.description: Increases the wearer's DMG to debuffed enemies by {{24//28//32//36//40%}}. When the wearer uses their Skill, the Effect Hit Rate for this attack increases by {{18//21//24//27//30%}}, and ATK increases by {{24//28//32//36//40%}}.

zh.name: 以世界之名
zh.description: 使装备者对陷入负面效果的敌方目标造成的伤害提高{{24//28//32//36//40%}}。当装备者施放战技时，装备者此次攻击的效果命中提高{{18//21//24//27//30%}}，攻击力提高{{24//28//32//36//40%}}。
